ease-in-out;width:55px;height:3px;border-radius:50px;text-align:center;background-color:rgba(232,207,192,.3803921568627451);box-shadow:inset -4px 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,.4)}.theme-switch__label:after,.theme-switch__label:before{font-size:1.5rem;position:absolute;transform:translate3d(0,-50%,0);top:50%}.theme-switch__label:before{content:"☼";right:100%;margin-right:10px;color:#ff6b08}.theme-switch__label:after{content:"☾";left:100%;margin-left:10px;color:#789}.theme-switch__label .circle{position:absolute;bottom:calc(100% + 10px);left:30px;width:100%}.theme-switch__label .circle:after{position:absolute;top:calc(100% + 15px);left:-25px;width:16px;height:16px;content:"";border-radius:50%;background-color:#fff;transition:transform .5s,background-color .5s;box-shadow:-3px 3px 8px rgba(0,0,0,.4)}.theme-switch__input:checked~.theme-switch__label{background-color:#789}.theme-switch__input:checked~.theme-switch__label:before{color:#789}.theme-switch__input:checked~.theme-switch__label:after{color:#fff}.theme-switch__input:checked~.theme-switch__label .circle:after{transform:translate3d(30px,0,0)}.footer{padding:30px;background-color:#f7f7f7;color:#545454;font-size:14px;line-height:1.14;text-align:center}@media screen and (min-width:768px){.footer{font-size:16px;line-height:1.19}}.footer__container{display:inline-block}@media screen and (max-width:767px){.footer__container:first-child{margin-bottom:10px}}.footer__icon{fill:#ff6b01}.footer__link{color:#545454;transition:color .25s cubic-bezier(.4,0,.2,1)}.footer__link:focus,.footer__link:hover{color:#ff6b01}.films{padding-top:20px;padding-bottom:40px}@media screen and (min-width:768px){.films{padding-top:60px;padding-bottom:50px}}.films__list{display:flex;align-items:flex-start;flex-wrap:wrap;list-style:none;padding:0;margin:0}@media screen and (min-width:768px){.films__list{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;margin:-15px;flex-direction:row}}@media screen and (max-width:767px){.films__list-item{width:100%}.films__list-item:not(:last-child){margin-bottom:20px}}@media screen and (min-width:768px){.films__list-item{width:294px;margin:15px}}@media screen and (min-width:1024px){.films__list-item{width:274px;transition:transform .2s}.films__list-item:hover{transform:scale(1.03)}}.list-is-empty__text{margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;font-size:15px;font-weight:500}.one-card{position:relative;overflow:hidden}.one-card:focus,.one-card:hover{cursor:pointer}.one-card__img{border-radius:5px;height:100%;width:100%;object-fit:cover;box-shadow:0 3px 8px rgba(0,0,0,.24)}.one-card__box-img{margin-bottom:10px}@media screen and (max-width:767px){.one-card__box-img{max-width:440px}}@media screen and (min-width:768px){.one-card__box-img{width:294px;height:398px}}@media screen and (min-width:1024px){.one-card__box-img{width:274px;height:398px}}@media screen and (max-width:767px){.one-card__title-box{max-width:440px}}@media screen and (min-width:768px){.one-card__title-box{width:294px}}@media screen and (min-width:1024px){.one-card__title-box{width:274px}}.one-card__title{width:inherit;color:#000;text-transform:uppercase}.one-card__description,.one-card__title{display:block;font-weight:500;font-size:12px;line-height:1.33}.one-card__description{margin-right:10px;color:#ff6b01}.one-card__box-description{display:flex;justify-content:start}.one-card__average{justify-content:center;width:36px;height:16px;color:#fff;text-transform:uppercase;font-weight:500;font-size:12px;line-height:1.17;background-color:#ff6b01}.one-card__average,.one-card_overlay{display:flex;align-items:center;border-radius:5px}.one-card_overlay{justify-content:space-around;position:absolute;bottom:100%;width:100%;padding-top:10px;padding-bottom:10px;background-color:rgba(48,49,59,.4);transition:transform .25s cubic-bezier(.4,0,.2,1)}@media screen and (max-width:767px){.one-card_overlay{justify-content:center}}.one-card:focus .one-card_overlay,.one-card:hover .one-card_overlay{transform:translateY(100%)}.btn_one-card{width:100px;height:35px;border-radius:5px;border:1px solid #000}@media screen and (max-width:767px){.btn_one-card{margin-left:15px}}.btn_one-card:focus,.btn_one-card:hover{background-color:#ff6b01;color:#fff;cursor:pointer;border-color:#ff6b01}
